page.title: 14Edlington Marching Bands.
page.content: The Cascades,Diamonds and Silver Bullets are bands in and around Edlington.The uniforms are all different.The Cascades'is burgundy and white with police womens hats.The Diamonds'is mainly red,white and blue. The Silver Bullets'is tartan with black jackets.All three bands get on together very well especially on competitions.To compeat, each band does a display and street march. Points are given by judges.We win medals for each section depending on our score.At the end of a competition the scruteneers decide who is the winner.The Cascades'practice is on Monday 5pm to 7pm and Friday 6pm to 7.30pm.The Diamonds practise Tuesday 5-7pm and Wednesday 5-7pm.The Silver Bullets practise Monday and Thursday 5.30-7.30pm.All three band's members pay 50p subs weekly.
